title: Ticket #6141: CGROUP_MEMORY_LIMIT_POLICY has 2 default values listed
description: I also note that Section 3.5.12 of the manual mistakenly identifies the default value for CGROUP_MEMORY_LIMIT_POLICY as "soft" rather than "none" as I believe is the case for 8.5.8+.
remarks:
2018-Sep-21 11:14:27 by jfrey:
The manual has the correct default value.
